General.Name: MNC Vision Networks PT
General.Description: PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides program retransmission, television (TV) advertising, high speed internet, internet protocol television, and other services in Indonesia. It also offers direct-to-home post-paid and prepaid pay TV, fixed broadband, and fiber based pay TV/IPTV services, as well as acts as a local cable operator. The company also engages in content production activities; and operates Vision+, an over the top based video streaming platform. The company was formerly known as PT. Sky Vision Networs and changed its name to PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk in February 2018. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Global Mediacom Tbk.
